name: Cold Turkey 2: 2 Frost 2 Flurrious
description:
The barely-anticipated sequel to Cold Turkey is finally here!

---

You're still one cold turkey! That's because you've lost all your tail feathers - AGAIN!

Find them all and return to the barn as quickly as possible, while avoiding the hungry, hungry humans. That's right, plural!

Challenges!

  • Can you beat 30 seconds? Tell me your best time!
  • Can you find the secret item???

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Retry: Esc

Mobile users! Enable touch controls at the title screen and use the on-screen buttons.
